summary: I have been depressed for a long time and when I joined college it got worse. I failed my first year in college and failed my parents. My little brother would be sad if he saw me kill myself. He is the most important thing in my life. I used to be the smartest kid in junior school. He used to help a lot of his friends in exams. He was bullied at school. Porn and bullying made it worse.
